wikitext.*:
'''Nimloth''' means "White Blossoms" in [[Sindarin]] (from ''[[nim]]-'', "pale, white" and ''[[loth]]'', "flowers, blossoms") and can refer to:
* [[Nimloth of Doriath]] (died {{FA|506}}), the wife of [[Dior|Dior Eluchíl]] and mother of [[Elwing]].
* [[Nimloth of Númenor]] ([[Second Age]]), the White Tree of [[Númenor]] which grew in [[Armenelos]].
